# Shock-turbulence interaction

Here we have an example included in the Combustion Toolbox for solving shock-turbulence interaction problems using linear theory.

```{toctree}
    :maxdepth: 2

examples_plain_SHOCKTURBULENCE_VORTICAL_ENTROPIC
examples_plain_SHOCKTURBULENCE_ACOUSTIC
examples_plain_SHOCKTURBULENCE_COMPRESSIBLE
```
